nodes.text: This scroll was a Sith manuscript written in the Sith, with a few notes in Basic found by Darth Zannah on Ruusan in 1000 BBY just after the Seventh Battle of Ruusan in the Brotherhood of Darkness' camp. After Darth Bane rid the camp of mercenaries seeking treasure, he gained valuable knowledge from this scroll. The scroll contained a compilation of the history and teachings of Freedon Nadd, numerous Sith spells, and some writings from Qordis including the location of Nadd's tomb.
